item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: For privacy and other reasons I have omitted information from this online CV. If you are interested in a conversation, please send me an e-mail, and I will forward you my updated CV in .pdf-format. Contact Information Name Felix Bert Place of residence Frankfurt a.M., Germany Nationality German E-Mail felix.bert@yahoo.com Experience Software Development, Institute of Automotive Engineering (FZD), TU Darmstadt Dec 2017–Mar 2018
